name: actions_remove-selected-repo-from-required-workflow
description:
Removes a repository from a required workflow. To use this endpoint, the required workflow must be configured to run on selected repositories.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint.

For more information, see "[Required Workflows](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//actions/using-workflows/required-workflows)."

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

required_workflow_id.description: The unique identifier of the required workflow.

repository_id.description: The unique identifier of the repository.
